languages.text: "...славься {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g}, силы и могущество которого преображают мертвые металлы для воплощения святых видений Бога-Машины. Новые протоколы, что переданы на синоде великим {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензором{/g}, приведены в исполнение, пускай и есть те, кто содрогнулся о мысли о смене Установленной Процедуры. Да скрепят сердца те из нас, чья слабость духа ведет к ошибкам в персональных исчислениях, ибо Фабрикатор-Цензор есть проводник всевышней воли и мудрейший из нас..."

"...praise be to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, whose might and power transforms dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} have been executed, despite those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator-Censor is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."
languages.original_text: "...славься {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g}, силы и могущество которого преображают мертвые металлы для воплощения святых видений Бога-Машины. Новые протоколы, что переданы на синоде великим {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензором{/g}, приведены в исполнение, пускай и есть те, кто содрогнулся о мысли о смене Установленной Процедуры. Да скрепят сердца те из нас, чья слабость духа ведет к ошибкам в персональных исчислениях, ибо Фабрикатор-Цензор есть проводник всевышней воли и мудрейший из нас..."

traits.locale_text: "...praise be to the Omnissiah, whose might and power transforms the dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great Fabricator have been executed, despite there being those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

"...praise be to the Omnissiah, whose might and power transforms the dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great Fabricator have been executed, despite there being those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

"...praise be to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, whose might and power transforms dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator{/g} have been executed, despite those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

"...praise be to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, whose might and power transforms dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} have been executed, despite those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator-Censor is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

languages.text: “……赞美{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}，愿祂的力量与权能改造没有生命的金属，愿万机之神的神圣愿景终得彰显。在会议上，伟大的{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}提出的新协议已经得到执行。不过，还是有一部分人。他们一想到要更改标准程序，就吓得浑身发抖。那些内心软弱，滋生了计算错误的伙伴们啊，请鼓起你们的勇气，因为铸造审查师是更高意志的指挥者，是我们之中最贤明的人……”
languages.original_text: "...praise be to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, whose might and power transforms dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} have been executed, despite those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator-Censor is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

traits.locale_text: “……赞美{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}，愿祂的力量与权能改造没有生命的金属，愿万机之神的神圣愿景终得彰显。在会议上，伟大的{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}提出的新协议已经得到执行。不过，还是有一部分人。他们一想到要更改标准程序，就吓得浑身发抖。那些内心软弱，滋生了计算错误的伙伴们啊，请鼓起你们的勇气，因为铸造审查师是更高意志的指挥者，是我们之中最贤明的人……”

languages.text: «...alabado sea el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, cuyo poder transforma los metales muertos para que manifiesten las visiones sagradas del Dios Máquina. Los nuevos protocolos que hemos recibido en el sínodo del gran {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g} se han ejecutado, pese a aquellos que se estremecían al pensar en cambiar un Proceso Estándar. Alienten sus corazones aquellos cuya debilidad interior conlleva a errores en los cálculos personales, pues el fabricator-censor es el director de las voluntades más altas y el más sabio de entre nosotros...».
languages.original_text: "...praise be to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, whose might and power transforms dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} have been executed, despite those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator-Censor is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

traits.locale_text: "...alabado sea el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, cuyo poder transforma los metales muertos para que manifiesten las visiones sagradas del Dios Máquina. Los nuevos protocolos que hemos recibido en el sínodo del gran {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g} se han ejecutado, pese a aquellos que se estremecían al pensar en cambiar un Proceso Estándar. Alienten sus corazones aquellos cuya debilidad interior conlleva a errores en los cálculos personales, pues el fabricator-censor es el director de las voluntades más altas y el más sabio de entre nosotros...».

languages.text: 「…権力と力で壊れた金属を変えて、機械神の聖なるビジョンを具現化する{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}に感謝する。標準的手順を変えるという話にざわつく者達もいたが、偉大な{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}から議会で受け取った新たなプロトコルを実行できた。己の計算で内なる弱さからエラーを出す者は心を奮い立たせよ。ファブリケーター・センサーは、高い志を持つ指導者で、私達の中で一番の頭脳を持った御方だ…」
languages.original_text: "...praise be to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, whose might and power transforms dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} have been executed, despite those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator-Censor is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

traits.locale_text: 「…権力と力で壊れた金属を変えて、機械神の聖なるビジョンを具現化する{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}に感謝する。標準的手順を変えるという話にざわつく者達もいたが、偉大な{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}から議会で受け取った新たなプロトコルを実行できた。己の計算で内なる弱さからエラーを出す者は心を奮い立たせよ。ファブリケーター・センサーは、高い志を持つ指導者で、私達の中で一番の頭脳を持った御方だ…」

languages.text: "... gesegnet sei der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, dessen Macht totes Metall verwandelt und daraus die heiligen Visionen des Maschinengottes manifestiert. Die neuen Protokolle aus der Synode des großen {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensors{/g} wurden umgesetzt, trotz der Bedenken aller, denen die Änderung von Standardprozessen missfällt. Wessen innere Schwäche zu Fehlern bei persönlichen Berechnungen führt, der fasse sich ein Herz, denn der Fabricator-Zensor setzt den höheren Willen um und ist der Weiseste unter uns ..."
languages.original_text: "...praise be to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, whose might and power transforms dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} have been executed, despite those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator-Censor is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

traits.locale_text: "... gesegnet sei der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, dessen Macht totes Metall verwandelt und daraus die heiligen Visionen des Maschinengottes manifestiert. Die neuen Protokolle aus der Synode des großen {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensors{/g} wurden umgesetzt, trotz der Bedenken aller, denen die Änderung von Standardprozessen missfällt. Wessen innere Schwäche zu Fehlern bei persönlichen Berechnungen führt, der fasse sich ein Herz, denn der Fabricator-Zensor setzt den höheren Willen um und ist der Weiseste unter uns ..."

languages.text: « ... loué soit l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} dont la puissance et le pouvoir transforment le métal interne pour donner corps aux saintes visions du Dieu-Machine. Les nouveaux protocoles du grand {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} reçus au synode ont été appliqués, malgré les réticences de ceux qui tremblaient à l'idée de modifier la Procédure Standard. Enhardissez-vous, vous dont la faiblesse intérieure engendre des erreurs de calculs personnels, car le fabricator-censeur est le chef d'orchestre d'une volonté supérieure et le plus sage d'entre nous... »
languages.original_text: "...praise be to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, whose might and power transforms dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} have been executed, despite those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator-Censor is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

traits.locale_text: « ... loué soit l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} dont la puissance et le pouvoir transforment le métal interne pour donner corps aux saintes visions du Dieu-Machine. Les nouveaux protocoles du grand {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} reçus au synode ont été appliqués, malgré les réticences de ceux qui tremblaient à l'idée de modifier la Procédure Standard. Enhardissez-vous, vous dont la faiblesse intérieure engendre des erreurs de calculs personnels, car le fabricator-censeur est le chef d'orchestre d'une volonté supérieure et le plus sage d'entre nous... »

languages.text: "Gücü ve kudreti ile Makine Tanrı'nın kutsal görülerini tezahür ettirmek için ölü metali canlandıran {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'e{/g} hamdolsun. Yüce {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün{/g} meclisten yeni ilettiği protokoller, bir Standart Prosedür'ü değiştirme düşüncesiyle ürperenlere rağmen uygulandı. Yüreklenin ey iç zayıflıkları şahsi hesaplarında hata doğuranlar! Denetçi Fabrikatör, yüksek iradenin kılavuzu ve en bilge olanımızdır."
languages.original_text: "...praise be to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, whose might and power transforms dead metal to make manifest the holy visions of the Machine God. The new protocols received at the synod from the great {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} have been executed, despite those who shuddered at the thought of changing a Standard Procedure. Embolden your hearts, those whose inner weakness breeds errors in personal calculations, for the Fabricator-Censor is the conductor of the higher will and the wisest among us..."

traits.locale_text: "...gücü ve kudreti ile Makine Tanrı'nın kutsal görülerini tezahür ettirmek için ölü metali canlandıran {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'e hamdolsun. Yüce {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör{/g}'ün meclisten yeni ilettiği protokoller, bir Standart Prosedür'ü değiştirme düşüncesiyle ürperenlere rağmen uygulandı. İç zayıflıkları şahsi hesaplarında hata doğuranlar yüreklenin, Denetçi Fabrikatör yüksek iradenin kılavuzu ve aramızdaki en bilgedir..."
